channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S Stocks Mixed After Solid Jobs Report
item.description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite rose, while the Dow industrials slipped after November payrolls data showed the labor market remains in decent health...

item.title: Shares of American Eagle plunge 13% as company issues weak holiday guidance
item.description: American Eagle issued weak holiday guidance after reporting its third sales miss in a row.

item.title: How to Give Gifts for the Holidays and Stay on Budget
item.description: I can’t give something to everybody in my life. The trick is narrowing down the list—and keeping it all affordable.

item.title: Gold Retreats After U.S. Hiring Bounces Back
item.description: Gold was little changed, retreating after rising earlier in the session, after U.S. hiring bounced back in November.

item.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Head for Weekly Loss
item.description: U.S. natural gas futures fell and were on track for a weekly loss, while managing to hold above $3 despite recent milder temperature forecasts and thi...

item.title: Foot Locker shares tumble as it issues gloomy holiday outlook, sees 'softness' at Nike
item.description: Foot Locker fell short of Wall Street expectations and cut its guidance after sales declined more than expected.

item.title: Salesforce surges on revenue beat, AI growth prospects – here's our new price target for the stock
item.description: Salesforce made clear that Agentfoce, its new AI offering, can kickstart revenue growth in the quarters ahead.

item.title: U.S. Sues Comerica Bank Over Treatment of Federal Benefits Users
item.description: The CFPB accused the Comerica banking subsidiary of deliberately hanging up on millions of Direct Express cardholders’ customer service calls, impedin...

item.title: Ulta Beauty shares pop as retailer beats earnings expectations despite demand fears
item.description: The retailer hiked its full-year outlook slightly to reflect the better-than-expected results.

item.title: Lululemon stock jumps as international growth helps to offset slowing U.S. sales
item.description: Lululemon has been in a bit of a rough spot after the departure of its longtime Chief Product Officer Sun Choe.
